quotes.quote: The two most powerful warriors are patience and time.
quotes.author: Leo Tolstoy, War and Peace

quotes.quote: Time is what we want most, but what we use worst.
quotes.author: William Penn, Fruits of Solitude

quotes.quote: All we have to decide is what to do with the time that is given us.
quotes.author: J.R.R. Tolkien, The Fellowship of the Ring

quotes.quote: The most precious resource we all have is time.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.quote: Time has a wonderful way of showing us what really matters.
quotes.author: Margaret Peters

quotes.quote: Time is a created thing. To say ‘I don’t have time’ is to say ‘I don’t want to.’
quotes.author: Lao Tzu

quotes.quote: No man goes before his time. Unless the boss leaves early.
quotes.author: Groucho Marx

quotes.quote: Time is free, but it’s priceless. You can’t own it, but you can use it. You can’t keep it, but you can spend it. Once you’ve lost it, you can never get it back.
quotes.author: Harvey MacKay

quotes.quote: The future is something which everyone reaches at the rate of sixty minutes an hour, whatever he does, whoever he is.
quotes.author: C.S. Lewis

quotes.quote: The bad news is time flies. The good news is you’re the pilot.
quotes.author: Michael Altshuler

quotes.quote: There’s only one thing more precious than our time and that’s who we spend it on.
quotes.author: Leo Christopher

quotes.quote: An inch of time is an inch of gold, but you can’t buy that inch of time with an inch of gold.
quotes.author: Chinese Proverb

quotes.quote: There’s never enough time to do it right, but there’s always enough time to do it over.
quotes.author: Jack Bergman

quotes.quote: A man who dares to waste an hour of time has not discovered the value of life.
quotes.author: Charles Darwin

quotes.quote: Time isn’t the main thing. It’s the only thing.
quotes.author: Miles Davis

quotes.quote: I am not particularly interested in saving time; I prefer to enjoy it.
quotes.author: Eduardo Galeano

quotes.quote: Time flies over us, but leaves its shadow behind.
quotes.author: Nathaniel Hawthorne, The Marble Faun

quotes.quote: Time is what keeps everything from happening at once.
quotes.author: Ray Cummings, The Girl in the Golden Atom

quotes.quote: It’s not that we have little time, but more that we waste a good deal of it.
quotes.author: Seneca

quotes.quote: I wish I could turn back the clock and find you sooner so I can love you longer.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Time moves slowly, but passes quickly.
quotes.author: Alice Walker, The Color Purple

quotes.quote: You will never find time for anything. If you want time, you must make it.
quotes.author: Charles Buxton

quotes.quote: There’s never enough time to do all the nothing you want.
quotes.author: “Calvin and Hobbes” by Bill Watterson

quotes.quote: They always say time changes things, but you actually have to change them yourself.
quotes.author: Andy Warhol, The Philosophy of Andy Warhol

quotes.quote: Time is a waste of money.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: Time is a great healer, but a poor beautician.
quotes.author: Lucille S. Harper

quotes.quote: No measure of time with you will be long enough. But let’s start with forever.
quotes.author: Stephenie Meyer, Breaking Dawn

quotes.quote: You can’t turn back the clock. But you can wind it up again.
quotes.author: Bonnie Prudden

quotes.quote: Time and tide wait for no man, but time always stands still for a woman of 30.
quotes.author: Robert Frost

quotes.quote: Time has no meaning when you’re in love.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Better three hours too soon than one minute too late.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare, The Merry Wives of Windsor

quotes.quote: There is never a time or place for true love. It happens accidentally, in a heartbeat, in a single flashing, throbbing moment.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: There is a time for work and a time for love. That leaves no other time.
quotes.author: Coco Chanel

quotes.quote: Time is the longest distance between two places.
quotes.author: Tennessee Williams, The Glass Menagerie

quotes.quote: To live is so startling, it leaves little time for anything else.
quotes.author: Emily Dickinson

quotes.quote: Lost time is never found again.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin, Poor Richard’s Almanac

quotes.quote: The only reason for time is so that everything doesn’t happen at once.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: Time you enjoy wasted was not time wasted.
quotes.author: John Lennon

quotes.quote: Time is precious. Make sure you spend it with the right people.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Who controls the past, controls the future: who controls the present controls the past.
quotes.author: George Orwell, 1984

quotes.quote: Time, which changes people, does not alter the image we have of them.
quotes.author: Marcel Proust

quotes.quote: If you judge people, you have no time to love them.
quotes.author: Mother Teresa

quotes.quote: The few hours I spend with you are worth the thousand hours I spend without you.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: If you spend too much time thinking about a thing, you’ll never get it done.
quotes.author: Bruce Lee

quotes.quote: Men talk of killing time, while time quietly kills them.
quotes.author: Dion Boucicault

quotes.quote: Don’t waste your time in anger, regrets, worries, and grudges. Life is too short to be unhappy.
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett, The Light in the Heart

quotes.quote: It has been said, 'time heals all wounds.' I do not agree. The wounds remain. In time, the mind, protecting its sanity, covers them with scar tissue and the pain lessens. But it is never gone.
quotes.author: Rose Fitzgerald Kennedy

quotes.quote: It is the time you have wasted for your rose that makes your rose so important.
quotes.author: Antoine de Saint-Exupéry, The Little Prince

quotes.quote: Time is a very misleading thing. All there is ever, is the now. We can gain experience from the past, but we can't relive it; and we can hope for the future, but we don't know if there is one.
quotes.author: George Harrison

quotes.quote: Own time, or time will own you.
quotes.author: Brian Norgard

quotes.quote: Time is a game played beautifully by children.
quotes.author: Heraclitus, Fragments

quotes.quote: Being with you and not being with you is the only way I have to measure time.
quotes.author: Jorge Luis Borges

quotes.quote: How did it get so late so soon? It's night before it's afternoon. December is here before it's June. My goodness how the time has flewn. How did it get so late so soon?”— Dr. Seuss, “How Did it Get So Late So Soon?”
Time takes it all, whether you want it to or not.
quotes.author: Stephen King, The Green Mile

quotes.quote: Time can be a greedy thing-sometimes it steals the details for itself.
quotes.author: Khaled Hosseini, The Kite Runner

quotes.quote: Time is a slippery thing: lose hold of it once, and its string might sail out of your hands forever.
quotes.author: Anthony Doerr, All The Light We Cannot See

quotes.quote: Clocks slay time... time is dead as long as it is being clicked off by little wheels; only when the clock stops does time come to life.
quotes.author: William Faulkner, The Sound and the Fury

quotes.quote: It is looking at things for a long time that ripens you and gives you a deeper meaning.
quotes.author: Vincent Van Gogh

quotes.quote: Punctuality is the thief of time.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde, The Picture of Dorian Gray

quotes.quote: With endless time, nothing is special. With no loss or sacrifice, we can’t appreciate what we have.
quotes.author: Mitch Albom, The Time Keeper

quotes.quote: The wisest are the most annoyed at the loss of time.
quotes.author: Dante Alighieri

quotes.quote: We shouldn't waste time on things that might happen, but on things that have already happened.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: The two most powerful warriors are patience and time.
quotes.author: Leo Tolstoy, War and Peace

quotes.quote: Time is what we want most, but what we use worst.
quotes.author: William Penn, Fruits of Solitude

quotes.quote: All we have to decide is what to do with the time that is given us.
quotes.author: J.R.R. Tolkien, The Fellowship of the Ring

quotes.quote: The most precious resource we all have is time.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.quote: Time has a wonderful way of showing us what really matters.
quotes.author: Margaret Peters

quotes.quote: Time is a created thing. To say ‘I don’t have time’ is to say ‘I don’t want to.’
quotes.author: Lao Tzu

quotes.quote: No man goes before his time. Unless the boss leaves early.
quotes.author: Groucho Marx

quotes.quote: Time is free, but it’s priceless. You can’t own it, but you can use it. You can’t keep it, but you can spend it. Once you’ve lost it, you can never get it back.
quotes.author: Harvey MacKay

quotes.quote: The future is something which everyone reaches at the rate of sixty minutes an hour, whatever he does, whoever he is.
quotes.author: C.S. Lewis

quotes.quote: The bad news is time flies. The good news is you’re the pilot.
quotes.author: Michael Altshuler

quotes.quote: There’s only one thing more precious than our time and that’s who we spend it on.
quotes.author: Leo Christopher

quotes.quote: An inch of time is an inch of gold, but you can’t buy that inch of time with an inch of gold.
quotes.author: Chinese Proverb

quotes.quote: There’s never enough time to do it right, but there’s always enough time to do it over.
quotes.author: Jack Bergman

quotes.quote: A man who dares to waste an hour of time has not discovered the value of life.
quotes.author: Charles Darwin

quotes.quote: Time isn’t the main thing. It’s the only thing.
quotes.author: Miles Davis

quotes.quote: I am not particularly interested in saving time; I prefer to enjoy it.
quotes.author: Eduardo Galeano

quotes.quote: Time flies over us, but leaves it shadow behind.
quotes.author: Nathaniel Hawthorne, The Marble Faun

quotes.quote: Time is a waste of money.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: Time is a great healer, but a poor beautician.
quotes.author: Lucille S. Harper

quotes.quote: No measure of time with you will be long enough. But let’s start with forever.
quotes.author: Stephenie Meyer, Breaking Dawn

quotes.quote: You can’t turn back the clock. But you can wind it up again.
quotes.author: Bonnie Prudden

quotes.quote: Time and tide wait for no man, but time always stands still for a woman of 30.
quotes.author: Robert Frost

quotes.quote: Time has no meaning when you’re in love.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Better three hours too soon than one minute too late.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare, The Merry Wives of Windsor

quotes.quote: There is never a time or place for true love. It happens accidentally, in a heartbeat, in a single flashing, throbbing moment.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: There’s never enough time to do all the nothing you want.
quotes.author: Calvin and Hobbes by Bill Watterson

quotes.quote: They always say time changes things, but you actually have to change them yourself.
quotes.author: Andy Warhol, The Philosophy of Andy Warhol

quotes.quote: Time is a storm in which we are all lost.
quotes.author: William Carlos Williams

quotes.quote: I don't need time, I need a deadline.
quotes.author: Duke Ellington

quotes.quote: Each day a day goes by.
quotes.author: Carlo Goldoni

quotes.quote: The key is in not spending time, but in investing it.
quotes.author: Stephen R. Covey, The 7 Habits of Highly Effective People

quotes.quote: Time is more value than money. You can get more money, but you cannot get more time.
quotes.author: Jim Rohn

quotes.quote: We must use time as a tool, not as a couch.
quotes.author: John F. Kennedy

quotes.quote: Determine never to be idle. No person will have occasion to complain of the want of time who never loses any. It is wonderful how much can be done if we are always doing.
quotes.author: Thomas Jefferson

quotes.quote: We must use time wisely and forever realize that the time is always ripe to do right.
quotes.author: Nelson Mandela

quotes.quote: There’s time enough, but none to spare.
quotes.author: Charles W. Chesnutt

quotes.quote: Time expands, then contracts, all in tune with the stirrings of the heart.
quotes.author: Haruki Murakami, Kafka on the Shore

quotes.quote: All great achievements require time.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.quote: Time flies. It’s up to you to be the navigator.
quotes.author: Robert Orben

quotes.quote: Time will explain.
quotes.author: Jane Austen, Persuasion

quotes.quote: Time and tide wait for no man.
quotes.author: Geoffrey Chaucer

quotes.quote: Time is a companion that goes with us on a journey.
quotes.author: Captain Jean-Luc Picard, STAR TREK

quotes.quote: Enjoy life. There’s plenty of time to be dead.
quotes.author: Hans Christian Andersen

quotes.quote: Time makes more converts than reason.
quotes.author: Thomas Paine, Common Sense

quotes.quote: As time goes by, you seem to weed out the things that were making your life hard.
quotes.author: Tom Petty

quotes.quote: Time stays long enough for anyone who will use it.
quotes.author: Leonardo da Vinci

quotes.quote: The innocent and the beautiful have no enemy but time.
quotes.author: William Butler Yeats

quotes.quote: The best time to plant a tree was 20 years ago. The second best time is now.
quotes.author: Chinese Proverb

quotes.quote: Time is long but life is short.
quotes.author: Stevie Wonder

quotes.quote: There are no secrets that time does not reveal.
quotes.author: Jean Racine

quotes.quote: Time is the wisest counselor of all.
quotes.author: Pericles

quotes.quote: You can’t make up for lost time. You can only do better in the future.
quotes.author: Ashley Ormon

quotes.quote: The way we spend our time defines who we are.
quotes.author: Jonathan Estrin

quotes.quote: It’s a strange thing, but when you are dreading something, and would give anything to slow down time, it has a disobliging habit of speeding up.
quotes.author: J.K. Rowling, Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince

quotes.quote: Whether it’s the best of times or the worst of times, it’s the only time we’ve got.
quotes.author: Art Buchwald

quotes.quote: The present time has one advantage over every other — it is our own.
quotes.author: Charles Caleb Colton

quotes.quote: Lack of time is actually lack of priorities.
quotes.author: Tim Ferriss, Tools of Titans

quotes.quote: We go back and forth between being time’s master and its victim.
quotes.author: James Gleick
